name: Soul of Winter
description:
Svanya's sisters, the other Seasonals, are struggling to find a way to keep humans alive in the wake of Svanya's eternal winter. How will they figure out a way to repair Svanya's broken heart before all life on Earth perishes?

The long-awaited sequel to Heart of Winter! Released for the 2021 Winter Jam, the kinetic visual novel includes one romantic ending artwork, and a 2.5k word script.

It is strongly recommended that you read Heart of Winter first before reading Soul of Winter.

Conceptualized and executed by NyanBacon

Tree of Life scene music by Trufata
